attributes.action: legalise euthanasia in the United Kingdom and/or support those who elect to travel to euthanasia clinics outside of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following this evening's (8th Aug 2007) ITV documentary entitled "Malcolm & Barbara - Love's Farewell" focusing on the couple's fifteen year struggle with Malcolm's Alzheimer's Disease, I petition the Prime Minister to legalise assisted suicide in this country and support those who elect to travel to Euthanasia Clinics outside of the United Kingdom to end the suffering of those affected by such illnesses and their carers.  

I also ask that the law recognise "Living Wills", and legalise the act of fulfilling the wishes expressed in the document, even if this includes withdrawl of medication or more direct action to end life.
